"Les raisons possibles d'un échec de connexion :
Erreur de connexion. Essayer de mettre hors tension tout votre matériel de réseautage, attendre quelques minutes et se connecter à nouveau. Si cela ne fonctionne pas, vous pouvez cloner les adresses MAC, ou paramétrer les protocoles WAN.
Fonds insuffisants. Contactez votre fournisseur réseau pour plus d'informations.
Si vous avez changé votre FAI récemment, vérifier si tous les changements ont été pris en compte."

"Les raisons possibles d'un échec de connexion :
Identifiant et mot de passe incorrect de votre compte LAN. Vérifier si les informations saisies sont correctes ou renouveler le mot de passe de votre LAN.
Fonds insuffisants. Contactez votre fournisseur réseau pour plus d'informations.
Le matériel de réseautage de votre FAI ne fonctionne pas correctement. Contactez votre fournisseur réseau pour plus d'informations."

"Current Pending Sector Count: %1$s
This is a key element of S.M.A.R.T info. When the value is greater than 0, it means there are sectors that can't be restored on your drive. The more this value is, the more damaged sectors there are on the drive."

Dual-band Wi-Fi off. 5G network uses the same network name (example_5G) and password as the 2.4 one. You can change this in settings.

When turned on, 2.4G and 5G will have the same name (2.4G configuration by default). The best signal will be selected for you to connect. The internet connection may be briefly interrupted when changes apply.

Mi-Routeur needs an internet connection to initialize USB removable storage.
Update Mi-Routeur or Mi-Routeur app and Essayer à nouveau.
Make sure that permissions for this storage device are set to read/write.
You need to connect removable storage first
"You're currently participating in our User Experience Program"

"Mi-Routeur App User Experience Program
Xiaomi Inc. (\"Xiaomi\") invite you to take part in our User Experience Program (\"the Program\"). If you choose participate, data and usage statistics for Mi-Routeur app will be sent to Xiaomi so that we can better understand how this product is being used.
We don't collect any personally identifiable information or user data (contacts, call history, etc.) as a part of the Program. We collect statistics about how (and how often) you use Mi-Routeur's various features.
1. Opting in or out You can opt in or out of the Program anytime in Settings.
2. Purpose of this Program We aggregate your data and usage statistics into anonymous statistics to help us learn more about how Mi-Routeur is being used and improve overall stability and quality. More specifically, we use this info for the following: 1. Pushing new updates and repairing bugs as quickly as possible. 2. Optimizing router performance for different types of connections (e.g. ADSL, Optical fiber). 3. Making sure the Mi-Routeur is compatible with as many different types of devices as possible 4. Improving connectivity and features for Mi devices. 5. Provide anonymous data usage statistics for plug-in developers for Mi-Routeur.
3. Updates to the Program We're always changing and improving our products, we may also make changes to the Program. If we do, we'll notify you via a notification in the Mi-Routeur app.
Xiaomi Inc. "
Help Xiaomi improve this product by sending us data and usage statistics. [Learn more]
Setting up a WPS connection takes less than 2 minutes;
When a user presses the WPS button on a nearby device, it can connect to the network automatically;
The device can connect to the internet through the router.

手机加速后，应用在后台会被其他应用偷偷启动。
锁屏5分钟后，自动清理后台内存，减少耗电。
在解屏瞬间，内存超过80%，自动加速。
彻底关闭应用，禁止应用自动重启。
Vous aide à prolonger le temps de veille lorsque la batterie de votre téléphone est faible。
如果开启强效服务后出现随机朗读问题，是由于 TTS(Text-to-Speech output)和百度手机卫士产生冲突，关闭 TTS 即可。
